CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 17, 1954, pg. 27, reads: "Make Pirate Debut - Curt Roberts, left, and Sam Jethroe, right, poise with Pittsburgh Pirate Manager Fred Haney shortly before the start of Tuesday's opening game with the Philadelphia Phillies at Forbes Field.  Roberts, who opened the season at second base, became the first Negro to ever play with the local nine.  Jethroe is expected to see plenty of action before the season is over. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Pittsburgh Pirates baseball players Curtis "Curt" Roberts, manager Fred Haney, and Sam Jethroe at Forbes Field
